title: [BUG] SET command doesn't work with NX & GET options
body:
**Describe the bug**
When called with NX & GET options, SET returns a syntax error.

**To reproduce**
SET randomkey "yes" NX GET

**Expected behavior**
Should return a Null Bulk Reply.
[SET command return value](https://redis.io/commands/set#return-value)

**Screenshot**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33120223/107952084-4aab7f80-6f67-11eb-9db6-9a13ed295678.png)
